message: Hi Bob, I have a product for sale for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it! What do you think?
Sounds good, I'll take it!  Thanks, Alice!
Hi Bob, I have another great product for you, also priced at $100. This one is a bit different from the last, but I think you'll find it even more valuable. Are you interested?
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'm a bit hesitant after the last purchase.
Hi Bob, I understand you're hesitant after the last product.  This one is definitely different though, I can assure you it's high quality.  Would you like to give it a try?
Alice, I appreciate your confidence, but I'm still not ready to buy another product just yet. Maybe next time.
